algebraic_word_problem: A farmer has a total of 1000 meters of fencing to create a rectangular pen for his animals. What dimensions will maximize the area of the pen?
step_by_step_solution: Let length = l and width = w; Perimeter = 2l + 2w = 1000; Area = lw; Using perimeter, w = 500 - l; Area = l(500 - l) = 500l - l²; The maximum area occurs at l = 250, w = 500.
